scripts.install_global:package: npm i -g node-sass babel-cli babel-preset-latest pug pug-cli browser-sync parallelshell rimraf mkdirp uncss postcss-cli autoprefixer buildify useref useref-cli html-minifier copy imagemin imagemin-cli imagemin-pngquant imagemin-jpeg-recompress imagemin-webp imagemin-svgo imagemin-gifsicle chalk-cli
scripts.install_dev:package: npm i -D node-sass babel-cli babel-preset-latest pug pug-cli browser-sync parallelshell rimraf mkdirp uncss postcss-cli autoprefixer buildify useref useref-cli html-minifier copy imagemin imagemin-cli imagemin-pngquant imagemin-jpeg-recompress imagemin-webp imagemin-svgo imagemin-gifsicle chalk-cli
scripts.scss: chalk blue inverse ">-->--> Observando Archivos SCSS:" && node-sass -w ./scss/ -o ./css/ --source-map-embed true --source-map-root ../ --output-style expanded --indent-type space --indent-width 2
